channel.title: Looking for a good [508 / 525]
channel.description:
hey i had a server and forgot the name of it. do you know any server where the home was at grand exchange and asoon as you walked out it became pk and when u die you dont get drops but u get a random drop. also what do you call it when u kill some and what they drop is not what they were wielding?
THANKS SO MUCH!
